content: The evidence quality isn't good?  What are those who have dedicated themselves to research doing?  The evidence quality in general is not only "not good", it's downright pathetic.
name: The Lisa Colagrossi Foundation
title: How Frequently Do Small Brain Aneurysms Rupture?

content: Not at all conclusive.  There needs to be a much stronger and more targeted effort on the research front.
name: The Lisa Colagrossi Foundation
title: Risk of rupture in small brain aneurysms is low, study finds

content:
RACING FOR BRAIN ANEURYSM AWARENESS.  Today, The Lisa Colagrossi Foundation is excited to announce a partnership with Joey Gase Racing and NASCAR on NBC at the Brickyard 400 Indianapolis Motor Speedway the weekend of July 22/23.  

The general public, fans, and those affected by #BrainAneurysms may ride along for this once in a lifetime opportunity by making a donation to The Lisa Colagrossi Foundation.  For each donation made in the amount of $100,  an awareness ribbon with the name of a loved one will be placed on the race üèÅ car.  Please note the name of the person you would like to be on the car at the time of your donation.  Space is limited to the first 75 donors. 

Also, we encourage you to get other family members and friends involved to donate in your name.  The person with the most donations in their name will win complimentary admission for two (2) to the industry's premier charity benefit, "A Cerebral Affair", in NYC on September 21.  This is going to be an unforgettable evening!  

Visit lisafoundation.org to make your donation and make sure you include an email address and name of the person you want on the car by tapping "add special instructions to the seller" at top of page. 

More details of the race partnership will be announced in the coming weeks.  Join us, honor someone affected by Brain Aneurysms, and lets take the checkered flag!  Please send questions to info@lisafoundation.org and look forward to you joining us for this unique opportunity.
name: The Lisa Colagrossi Foundation
title: Photos from The Lisa Colagrossi Foundation's post

content: One potential paint scheme for our NASCAR on NBC with Joey Gase Racing.  Where will your ribbon/name appear?  Let us know what you think. #leadingthefight #nationalbrainaneurysmawareness

content:
Join us and make history as we Race üèÅ for Brain Aneurysm Awareness.  We had an exciting conversation with NASCAR today.  Make a donation in the amount of $100 and we'll add an awareness ribbon with the name of your choice to the race car.  All participants will receive a digital picture of their ribbon and the car as a keepsake. 

Visit lisafoundation.org, click the blue donate button, and add the person name you want on the car in the "add special instructions to the seller" area at the top of the donation page.  Spots are sell by and space is limited!!  More details to follow.
name: The Lisa Colagrossi Foundation
title: Photos from The Lisa Colagrossi Foundation's post

content:
The Lisa Colagrossi Foundation to honor former NFL player Konrad Reuland next month Indianapolis Motor Speedway on hood of Joey Gase Racing.  Konrads story made national news last month when it was learned his heart was donated to MLB legend Rod Carew. Konrad's grieving parents are teaming up with the Foundation and will join us at the race üèÅ!  

A number of people affected by brain aneurysms have bought a ribbon for the car including some notable names.  More details to follow

content:
Our founder, Todd Crawford, will be featured on WKYC Channel 3 - Cleveland Live on Lakeside WKYCMonday, June 19 at noon today. 

Topics discussed will include the foundation's life saving work from Brain Aneurysms and its emergence as the nations leader in breakthrough awareness and education programs including the industry's very first national public service announcement.
